hero.title: Swifter than any, to the horizon beyond.

items.name: IT Consulting & Data Analysis
items.description: DX support service that visualizes current status through Python-based scraping and BI analysis, accompanying from strategy planning to implementation.

items.name: Web & Mobile App Development
items.description: One-stop provision of high-speed, rich UX B2B/B2C apps using the latest frameworks like Flutter and React.

items.name: AI Solution Development
items.description: Developing intelligent apps and automation tools optimized for customer challenges using generative AI/LLM, image recognition, and voice processing.

about.title: About
about.description: Cor.inc's mission is to 'pioneer the future through co-creation rather than competition, realizing a happy society.' We provide IT strategy consulting, product development, and develop and sell our own AI products. We emphasize 'co-creation' over 'competition' and leverage the startup strength of 'speed' to provide services full of creativity and innovation.

questions.question: What services do you provide?
questions.answer: We provide a wide range of DX support services including IT strategy consulting, Python data analysis, web and mobile app development, and AI/machine learning solutions.

questions.question: What regions do you serve?
questions.answer: While based in Fukuoka, we provide services to customers nationwide through online support.

questions.question: How long do projects typically take?
questions.answer: Project duration varies by scale and content. Small projects take 1-2 months, while large system development may take 6 months or more. Please contact us for specific details.

questions.question: What is your pricing structure?
questions.answer: We offer flexible pricing structures including monthly contracts and project-based contracts, tailored to meet customer needs based on project content and scale.

items.name: Taro Yamada
items.message: I was truly amazed by Cor.inc's speed and technical capabilities. They deeply understood our business challenges and provided optimal solutions.

items.name: Hanako Sato
items.role: Head of DX Promotion, XYZ Trading
items.message: With their support from data analysis to implementation, our internal DX has made significant progress. The business automation using Python was particularly effective.

items.name: Ichiro Suzuki
items.message: They completed a higher quality app than expected in a short time using Flutter and React. Their technology selection and implementation were precise.
